title: How to Create a Hot Pastrami Sandwich

steps.headline: Heat skillet over medium heat.
steps.description: Add butter and melt in skillet, if you are not using a nonstick skillet. Or spray the pan with nonstick cooking spray before heating.

steps.headline: Place 2 bread slices, butter side down, in skillet.
Top each bread slice with 2 slices cheese, 1 tablespoon dressing, 3 ounces Pastrami and ¼ of the coleslaw.
Top sandwich with buttered bread slice.
steps.description: Make sure the buttered bread slices are on the outside of the sandwich.

steps.headline: Cook sandwiches 4 to 6 minutes or until bread is golden brown and cheese is melted, turning once.
Serve with additional Thousand Island dressing, if desired.

text: Lightly butter bread slices.  Heat skillet over medium heat. Add butter and melt in skillet, if you are not using a nonstick skillet. Or spray the pan with nonstick cooking spray before heating. Place 2 bread slices, butter side down, in skillet.  Top each bread slice with 2 slices cheese, 1 tablespoon dressing, 3 ounces Pastrami and ¼ of the coleslaw.  Top sandwich with buttered bread slice. Make sure the buttered bread slices are on the outside of the sandwich. Cook sandwiches 4 to 6 minutes or until bread is golden brown and cheese is melted, turning once.  Repeat with remaining sandwiches.  Serve with additional Thousand Island dressing, if desired.  Finished.
